author: PostmodernJukebox
description:
“Pure Imagination” by Willy Wonka Jazz Ballad style cover by Postmodern Jukebox ft. Tawanda.
Get The Song: http://pmjlive.com/llm | Subscribe: http://bit.ly/subPMJ
World Tour Tix: http://pmjtour.com | PMJ on Spotify: http://pmjlive.com/pmjspotify 

Sarah Vaughan Jazz Vocal Award winner, Tawanda returns to bring her rich vocal tone and beautiful phrasing to this introspective version of “Pure Imagination,” from the 1971 film, “Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory,” accompanied on piano by PMJ founder / arranger, Scott Bradlee.

Follow Tawanda: 
https://www.tawandamusic.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tawandamusic
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hakunatawanda

See Postmodern Jukebox LIVE! Tickets On Sale NOW for the US/Canada, UK, Europe, Australia/NZ, Asia — find over 100 dates on sale here: http://pmjtour.com

Follow Postmodern Jukebox:
Mailing List: http://smarturl.it/pmjsignup

title: Pure Imagination (from "Willy Wonka") - Jazz Ballad Version feat. Tawanda
